gmd:organisationName.gco:CharacterString: NASA National Snow and Ice Data Center Distributed Active Archive Center

gmd:abstract.gco:CharacterString: This data set contains surface elevation rate of change measurements derived from IceBridge and Pre-IceBridge Airborne Topographic Mapper (ATM) widescan elevation measurements data (ILATM1B) for Arctic and Antarctic missions flown under NASA's Operation IceBridge (OIB) and Arctic Ice Mapping (AIM) projects.

gmd:description.gco:CharacterString: Direct download, with optional registration page.
Tool to visualize, search, and download IceBridge data.
Note: Reverb will be replaced with Earthdata Search in September 2016. NASA search and order tool for subsetting, reprojecting, and reformatting data.
NASA's newest search and order tool for subsetting, reprojecting, and reformatting data.
Documentation explaining the data and how it was processed.

eos:description.gco:CharacterString: The version of the SIPSMetGen software used to produce the metadata file for this granule

gmi:description.gco:CharacterString: A four-engined jet airliner, manufactured from 1958 to 1972
This is the Chilean Armada P-3 aircraft used during 2002, 2004, and 2008 NASA missions.
A four-engine turboprop surveillance aircraft developed for the United States Navy introduced in the 1960s
